description: Our cameraman swung by Tommy's place to drop off the cell phone that he left at the office a few days ago. When our guy got there, the door was unlocked and Tommy was nowhere to be found.</br></br>As he entered the living room, he noticed the sounds of a porn being played really loud upstairs, so he went to investigate, filming the whole way. What did he find? Tommy spanking his cock, of course!</br></br>That's right; Tommy was taking some time to pleasure himself to his favorite skin flick. So here you have it, Tommy in all his glory, sharing some alone time with his fans.</br></br>Be sure to check out the bonus footage after the credits too!</br></br>Enjoy.
title: Tommy Spanking His Cock
